original_text: I have told you about things that happen in this world. And you do not believe me. But now I am telling you about things that happen in heaven. So I do not think that you will ever believe me about those things.
korean_text: 내가 땅의 일을 말하여도 너희가 믿지 아니하거든 하물며 하늘의 일을 말하면 어떻게 믿겠느냐

sentences.original_text: I have told you about things
And you do not believe me
But now I am telling you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 지금 내가 너희에게 말하고 있다

sentences.original_text: about things that happen in heaven
that you will ever believe me
